name: Ejyk Nwamba
description:
'''Ejike Benedict Obiano''' known professionally as '''Ejyk Nwamba''' or '''Ogene master''', is a Nigerian musician from [[Anambra State]]. One of the front men in [[Ogene]] music, a musical style which is popular in the Eastern part of Nigeria, Nwamba is regarded as the best Ogene musician in [[Igboland]]. He is the recipient of several accolades, including Artist of the Year at the 2021 [[Ukpor]] Special Awards and Best Indigenous Artist of the Year at the 2022 [[Anambra State|Anambra]] Legends Achievers Awards.

Ejyk Nwamba is the founder and leader of Ogene Ubo Mma Group, his musical band.
